name: Seaside Keeper
description:
(Note: this game not support mobile controls)

Backstory:

The ocean been corrupted by human trash. as a revenge dead sea creatures come from the seaside to take revenge on the humanity!. help our player protect our world!

Controls:

move with: A,S,D,W / Arrow Keys

Aim with the mouse

shoot: left click on the mouse

Credits:

Made by Guy Hanan
